data.title: Written in Blood (Signed by Director Simon Cox)
data.meta_description: Simon Cox's first feature film, Written in Blood (1996) Staring Grant Masters, Sharon Small, Francis Magee, Gary Beadle, Doug Bradley, Nigel Pegram and Patrick Robinson.  A century ago a series of horrific murders rocked the city. Now as the end of the millennium approaches, a copycat killler stalks seven victims, preying on the unwary - repaying a pact with the devil which will plunge the world into chaos.  Martin Harris, a best selling horror fiction writer, stands between the forces of damnation and hope for redemption. A man who suspects that his own dark fantasties have cunjured the spirit of ancient evil to renewed life, and deep below the cirty streets he learns to his horror, that death is not the end... Special features include:Commentary by director Simon Cox Deleted Scenes2 Short films directed by Simon CoxThe Horror Channel interview with director Simon Cox which features the original pilot used to raise the finance.
data.text:
Simon Cox's first feature film, Written in Blood (1996)

Staring Grant Masters, Sharon Small, Francis Magee, Gary Beadle, Doug Bradley, Nigel Pegram and Patrick Robinson.

A century ago a series of horrific murders rocked the city. Now as the end of the millennium approaches, a copycat killler stalks seven victims, preying on the unwary - repaying a pact with the devil which will plunge the world into chaos.

Martin Harris, a best selling horror fiction writer, stands between the forces of damnation and hope for redemption. A man who suspects that his own dark fantasties have cunjured the spirit of ancient evil to renewed life, and deep below the cirty streets he learns to his horror, that death is not the end...

Special features include:

Commentary by director Simon Cox

Deleted Scenes

2 Short films directed by Simon Cox

The Horror Channel interview with director Simon Cox which features the original pilot used to raise the finance.
